entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 12.
